channel.description: Recent content in tutorial on EMCR Brain Science Network Website

item.title: Tutorial part 3: Deploying the site
item.description: The usual advice for deploying a blogdown or hugodown site is to deploy to Netlify rather than GitHub Pages, because there are a few peculiarities to GitHub Pages that can make it difficult. The third part of the tutorial walks you through both versions.
